get.description: Retrieve the Path to the S3 folder where the specified (either Daily or Interactive) AERA file is stored

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: Private Key associated with the calling Application

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: whether the Daily or Realtime (e.g. Interactive) path is sought

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: name of the Region the operation applies to (na, emea, aspac, latam)

parameters.name: x-api-key
parameters.description: Private Key associated with the calling Application

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: whether the Daily or Realtime (e.g. Interactive) path is sought

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: name of the Region the operation applies to (na, emea, aspac, latam)

requestBody.description: an AERA (Daily or Interactive) file depending on the parameters passed

Location.description: The path to the S3 file that was created

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: Authenticated API calls require the JWT in header
